name: Jesus Loves U (Epic FPS Jeus Game)
name_original: Jesus Loves U (Epic FPS Jeus Game)
description:
Literally a Unity Game Made by 15 year old in mostly 8 days.

First-Person Shooter game made for PC in the Unity Game engine using the High Definition Render Pipeline. (Make sure you have a somewhat decent PC specs before playing this game. No intel integrated graphics.)

Play as Jesus and "pacify" the roman soldiers so you don't get crucified!

Features:

- Walk on water

- Push/Pull objects away/towards you using Jesus powers.

- Squirt holy water at enemies.

- Multiply and throw bread at enemies.

- Use water to spit Red wine at enemies (shoot white wine for Alt-Fire, more accurate but lower fire rate.)

- Play as different ethnic versions of Jesus including (in alphabetical order):

    - Asian Jesus

    - Black Jesus

    - Hebrew Jesus

    - White Jesus

- Rasterized graphics made in Unity's HDRP with Normal-Mapping, Refraction and Sub-Surface-Scattering Materials, bloom, (togglable) motion blur, and reflection probes.

I made all of the assets myself except for the fonts, google images, unity default assets and music composed by: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRl6-nb4iOnsij-vnpAjp0Q. I made all of the non-unity models, textures, materials, UI, settings, SFX, and Visual effects using Unity pro Student plan and other free Windows 10 programs. Will eventually upload a devlog for the game at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUm1efpdDPuFYbD6PwFnDeg
